content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-13.0, -48.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0)
- Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -48.5) for storing iron ore
- Stone Furnace at position (-13.0, -48.0) for smelting iron ore into iron plates
- Burner Inserter at position (-14.5, -46.5) waiting for source items

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-11.0, -48.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (-11.0, -48.0) for smelting iron ore into iron plates

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-9.0, -48.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (-9.0, -48.0) for smelting iron ore into iron plates

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (43.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0)
- Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -80.5) for storing coal
- Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0) for smelting iron ore into iron plates
- Burner Inserter at position (43.5, -80.5) waiting for source items

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities
- Ensure there is enough space and no collisions with existing entities when placing new entities. Consider increasing spacing, changing direction, or adjusting the reference position to avoid placement errors.

### Errors due to insufficient inventory
- Maintain an adequate supply of necessary resources (e.g., iron ore) in the inventory to ensure continuous operation of furnaces. Regularly check and replenish inventory levels to avoid interruptions in production.

### Inserter waiting for source items
- Ensure that source items are available for inserters to pick up. Regularly check and manage inventories to prevent inserters from idling due to lack of source items.
